amendment.description: Amendment provides $110.5 million to the NIST Advanced Technology Program for the purposes of closing out all commitments for the ATP program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment specifying that the funds made available in the bill relating to the Advanced Technology and Technology Administration grants program shall be provided only to single applicants or joint venture participants that are small businesses, and specifying that funds for the Advanced Technology Program shall only be expended for the purpose of closing out commitments for the the program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
